title: BOTS have taken over ARAM
body: Is it just me noticing that BOTS (AI Controlled) Accounts are taking over in ARAM, At times i find my skills to be good, but not 42-2 good. they are being reported but the account just keep coming, RIOT can u please perma ban those caught doing so.

replies.body:
I just had two ARAM matches in a row with 8 bots in both cases :/ So uninteressting. I reported them all, hopfully it makes a difference.
I noticed two different types. One bot-typ always stays behind the last intact tower without doing anything and the other simply always blindly attacks - and dies under the enemy tower...

Yeah I've noticed them too, I am pretty new to the game so when I get a score like 28/3/18 I know something is up.
I was also just playing on a team with two accounts I assume are BOTS that just stood there until the other team was on our nexus and these bot accounts just started running in a straight line, not attacking, just running. I looked at the stats after the game and they had 0's for entire damage dealt section.
i onced went 42-3 with Mundo in aram, and im not a bot, :0

Hey kronoso304,

Accounts caught using 3rd party applications to level their accounts to level 30 (bots) are permanently suspended. Please continue to report these players to Riot Games Player Support so that Riot can close these accounts. 

Thanks!
